item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Now uses locationmap to resolve content. Use *.daisy.source to get the unprocessed source file from daisy. *.daisy.xml to get the document as an XDoc. *.daisy.img to get an image and *.daisy.navigation to get a site.xml snippet from a daisy navigation document.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Changed to use the daisy repository directly, bypassing the daisy-wiki.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Initial plugin code, allows content to be included from the daisy-wiki.
